raw_infobox.name: Charles Barkley
raw_infobox.caption: Barkley in 2019
raw_infobox.height_footnote: {{cite web |url=https://www.nytimes.com/2008/06/22/sports/basketball/22score.html |title=When Height Becomes a Tall Tale |work=The New York Times |last=Lieberman |first=Noah |date=June 22, 2008 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20180613020602/https://www.nytimes.com/2008/06/22/sports/basketball/22score.html |archive-date=June 13, 2018|quote="They lie," said Charles Barkley, a basketball commentator for TNT. "I've been measured at 6-5, 6-4 ¾. But I started in college at 6-6."}}
raw_infobox.highlights:
* NBA Most Valuable Player Award (1992)
* 11× NBA All-Star (1987–1997)
* NBA All-Star Game Most Valuable Player Award (1991)
* 5× All-NBA First Team (1987–1990, 1992)
* 5× All-NBA Second Team (1985, 1986, 1991, 1993, 1994)
* All-NBA Third Team (1995)
* NBA All-Rookie First Team (1984)
* List of National Basketball Association annual rebounding leaders (1986)
* NBA anniversary team (50 Greatest Players in NBA History, NBA 75th Anniversary Team)
* No. 34 Philadelphia 76ers#Retired numbers
* {{abbr|No.|Number}} 34 Phoenix Suns Ring of Honor{{cite web | url=https://www.nba.com/suns/news/phoenix-suns-to-unveil-permanent-banners-and-murals-as-part-of-reimagined-ring-of-honor-during-home-opener-on-october-28 | title=Phoenix Suns to Unveil Permanent Banners and Murals as Part of Reimagined Ring of Honor During Home Opener on October 28 | website=NBA.com | access-date=October 29, 2023 | archive-date=October 29, 2023 | archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20231029212141/https://www.nba.com/suns/news/phoenix-suns-to-unveil-permanent-banners-and-murals-as-part-of-reimagined-ring-of-honor-during-home-opener-on-october-28 | url-status=live }}
* Third-team NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans – National Association of Basketball Coaches (1984 NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans)
* Southeastern Conference Men's Basketball Player of the Year (1984)
* First-team All-Southeastern Conference (1984)
* 2× Second-team All-SEC (1982, 1983)
* SEC men's basketball tournament (1984 SEC men's basketball tournament)
* No. 34 Auburn Tigers men's basketball#Retired numbers
